  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3419</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3419</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Ajudem a escriure textos</string>
            <string language="en">We'll help you with your written work</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir helfen Ihnen mit Ihrer schriftlichen Arbeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous vous aiderons avec votre travail écrit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós ajudar-lhe-emos com seu trabalho escrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Li aiuteremo con il vostro lavoro scritto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θα σας βοηθήσουμε με τη γραπτή εργασία σας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs que ofereix un conjunt d'orientacions i pautes per tal d'ajudar  l'alumnat a escriure textos. Consta de tres apartats: planificar, redactar i revisar, i també adjunta enllaços a altres webs que tracten la mateixa temàtica.</string>
            <string language="en">A resource with advice and guidelines to help students with their written work. It is divided into three parts: planning, writing and reviewing. It also has links to other webpages on the same subject.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">text no literari</string>
            <string language="en">non-literary text</string>
            <string language="es">texto no literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">preescriptura</string>
            <string language="en">pre-writing</string>
            <string language="es">preescritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Hilfsmittel mit dem Rat und Korrekturlinien, 
zum der Kursteilnehmer mit ihrer schriftlichen Arbeit zu helfen. 
Sie wird in drei Teile geteilt: Planung, Schreiben und 
Wiederholen. Sie hat auch Links zu anderen Webseiten auf dem 
gleichen Thema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une ressource avec le conseil et les 
directives pour aider des étudiants avec leur travail écrit. 
Il est divisé en trois parts : planification, écriture 
et passer en revue. Il a également des liens à d'autres 
pages Web sur le même sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um recurso com o conselho e os guidelines para 
ajudar a estudantes com seu trabalho escrito. É dividido em 
três porções: planeamento, escrita e rever. Tem também
as ligações a outros Web pages no mesmo assunto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una risorsa con consiglio e la guida di 
riferimento per aiutare gli allievi con il loro lavoro scritto. 
È diviso in tre parti: progettazione, scrittura e 
rivedere. Egualmente ha collegamenti ad altri Web pagi sul 
medesimo argomento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς με τις συμβουλές και τις 
οδηγίες για να βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές με τη γραπτή εργασία 
τους. Διαιρείται σε τρία μέρη: προγραμματισμός, 
γράψιμο και αναθεώρηση. Έχει επίσης τις συνδέσεις με άλλα 
webpages στο ίδιο θέμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nicht-literarischer Text</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorschreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">texte non-littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pré-écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">texto non-literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pre-escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">testo non-letterario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pre-scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μη-λογοτεχνικό κείμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προ-γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
